person_say: I'm really worried about how others see me.
animal_say: It sounds like you could use a little bit of calming wisdom! How about I introduce you to Bruno, the mindfulness bear? He can help ease those worries!

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to have some calming wisdom from him to ease my worries.
animal_say: Yay! Here comes Bruno, the wise bear of the forest! He's ready to share some calming thoughts with you!
